rows.label: qst101603_msg0001
rows.name:
"One in the belly of the hermit."
Hmm... What could it mean...?

rows.label: qst101603_msg0002
rows.name:
You beat me to it?! Grrr... And I was
so close too!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0003
rows.name:
You found some strange parts? Could
you let me have a look?

rows.label: qst101603_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait... This looks a lot like my
grandpa's treasure!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0005
rows.name:
I knew it... So that's what
those words meant!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0006
rows.name:
The old man used to tell me this
saying about his treasure, see.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0007
rows.name:
"Gather ye the pieces three and three
and the hero's treasure ye shall reap."

rows.label: qst101603_msg0008
rows.name:
So there are two sets of three pieces
to my grandpa's treasure...six in total.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0009
rows.name:
The other four have gotta be
out there somewhere!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0010
rows.name:
Hey, this is no time for admiration.
We should consider each other as
rivals!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0011
rows.name:
Let's see who can get to the other
murals first and solve the riddles...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0012
rows.name:
See who gets their hands on the
remaining four pieces...

rows.label: qst101603_msg0013
rows.name:
Great! When we're done, we can
all meet back here!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0014
rows.name:
And then we can see what happens
when all the pieces are united, and
we'll blow this mystery wide open!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0015
rows.name: It's on! See you around, mates!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0201
rows.name: So you made it.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0203
rows.name:
You don't need to say a word. You
beat me to it, didn't you.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0204
rows.name:
My grandpa got this treasure from
salvaging.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0205
rows.name:
Apparently it comes from the
ancient sunken Divine Beast of Iira.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0206
rows.name:
Yeah, he went deep. Deeper than most
veteran salvagers feared to dive.
And this is what he came back with.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0207
rows.name:
But it took a lot out of him, the
poor guy. He died not long after.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0208
rows.name:
"Gather ye the pieces three and three
and the hero's treasure ye shall reap."

rows.label: qst101603_msg0209
rows.name:
That's what was written on the chest
with the piece he'd found.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0210
rows.name:
He entrusted me to find the other
five pieces.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0211
rows.name:
But I couldn't find any of them! What's
the point if I only have one?

rows.label: qst101603_msg0212
rows.name:
Come on. Put your pieces on the line
and we'll do battle one last time.

rows.label: qst101603_msg0213
rows.name: To the victor goes the spoils!

rows.label: qst101603_msg0214
rows.name:
I've lived for this moment!
Me and my grandpa both!
